comments.html:
As you well said, I don't think there is a 100% reliable way to know, but one thing that could help is to look for the aggregator BGP attribute that, if present, and showing different IPs, might be an indication of the prefix being originated in different locations.

Couple of examples:

http://lg.ring.nlnog.net/prefix_detail/lg01/ipv4?q=1.1.1.1 http://lg.ring.nlnog.net/prefix_detail/lg01/ipv4?q=208.67.222.222
comments.name: Alvaro Pereira
